main event: Mr. and Mrs. Burt Leedington observed a silvery object in the sky while driving on Highway 101 near Tillamook, Oregon, on January 24, 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as round and silvery, seen at an estimated elevation of 2000 feet., The sighting lasted about three minutes, with the object appearing stationary., After initially spotting the object, the couple attempted to show it to a store operator, but it disappeared before they could do so., The local airport confirmed that there was only one yellow plane in the air at the time, providing a possible explanation for the sighting., The Leedingtons' description of the object was consistent with reports of other similar sightings in the area.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Burt Leedington and Allen Hughes.
